== Karumady (628230) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Karumady is a village in the [[Ambalappuzha]] taluka of [[Alappuzha]] district with an area of 1493 hectares and harbouring 3307 households with total population of 13137 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Alappuzha]] is at a distance of 17 km. Male population is 6209 and female population is 6928. Scheduled Caste Population is 1260 and Scheduled Tribes population is 100. Census Location Code of the village is 628230<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

* Total literate population: 8870 (67.52%)
* Literate male population: 4199 (67.63%)
* Literate female population: 4671 (67.42%)
